title: The Major religions
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and Warren P. Everote
brief_description: An objective survey of the origins, rituals and symbols of the major religions of the world - namely, Hinduism, Buddhism, Judaism, Christianity and Islam. The film is designed to help inspire an appreciation for, and a tolerance of, the principal religious faiths held by most of the world’s people.
